completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith with 1 part - Web SPA (React 19/Vite 7/TypeScript/Zustand/Supabase PWA). 131 TS/TSX source files across 14 directories.
Found 78+ existing docs. User context: focus on changes since Jan 27 (scripture reading feature).
Tech stack: React 19.2.3 + Vite 7.3.1 + TS 5.9.3 + Zustand 5.0.10 + Supabase 2.90.1 + Tailwind 4.1.17. Node 24.13.0.

Deep scan of API (8 files), data models (11 tables), state management (10 slices), UI components (71 files/26 dirs), services (15 files). All docs written: api-reference.md, data-models.md, state-management.md, component-inventory.md, service-layer.md.
Source tree analysis with full annotated directory tree added to index.md. 131 source files, 26 component dirs, 8 migrations, 21 E2E specs, 9 utility scripts documented.
Development guide added to index.md: prerequisites, env setup, 20 npm scripts, test architecture, deployment pipeline.
Skipped - single-part monolith project, no multi-part integration needed.
Architecture doc (architecture-overview.md) already exists from Jan 23. Still accurate and comprehensive.
Supporting docs verified: project-context.md, architecture-overview.md, all deep scan docs in place.
Master index.md fully updated with: current stats (131 files, 11 tables, 10 slices), full annotated source tree, dev guide, all 11 database tables, complete doc links.
Validation complete. No incomplete markers. All docs accurate and current.
